ï»¿OFFiCIAL N 'c I DOCUMENTS i RECOMMENI ATION OF STATUTORY COMMITTEE TO: The President, International )evelopment Association Recommendation of the Committee under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement on the proposed Additional Financing For Labor Intensive Public Works Project to the Republic of Yemen. The undersigned Committee constitute I under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of the International Development Associatio i (the Association) hereby submits its recommendation pursuant to said Section in respect of the proposal that the Association extends to the Republic of Yemen an additional grant in an amount equivalent to SDI. 32,400,000. The purposes of said additional grant are to assist the Recipient to: (i) provide needed infre structure to improve access to basic public services; and (ii) create short term employment. 1. The Committee has carefully ;tudied the merits of the proposal to extend such additional financing, and of the purposes to which the proct eds of the additional financing are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of the opin on that the project in support of which the proceeds of such additional financing are to be applied continues .o come within the purposes of the Association as set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and th, t said project is designed to promote the economic development of the Republic of Yemen and is of high deN elopmental priority in the light of the needs of the Republic of Yemen. 3. Accordingly, the Committee finds that said project continues to merit financial assistance from the Association, and hereby recommends said project for such additional assistance.
